name: Wonder Room
effect: Defense and Special Defense will swap which stat they are calculated with. Lasts 4 Rounds. If performed under Cosmic Rays weather, this move only affects one side of the battlefield, user's choice.
description: Inside the Wonder Room, a strong mind makes a strong body and a resilient body makes for a resilient mind. However, if the mind is weak, the body will be weak and vice-versa.
